title: Sunshine Health
shortDescription: Florida Medicaid managed care plan with autism service coverage.
description: Sunshine Health is a Medicaid managed care plan operating in Florida, serving members enrolled in Florida Medicaid. As a Medicaid plan, Sunshine Health covers essential autism services including Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA), speech therapy, occupational therapy, and other medically necessary treatments. Sunshine Health is part of Centene Corporation and focuses on serving Florida's Medicaid population with coordinated care and support services.
benefits: ABA therapy coverage for eligible members
No cost or low cost for Medicaid members
eligibility: Available to Florida residents enrolled in Medicaid who select Sunshine Health as their managed care plan during enrollment or open enrollment periods.
